revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Asiatick researches : or, transactions of the society instituted in Bengal for enquiring into the history and antiquities, the arts, sciences, and literature, of A..."
revision.text: Possibly: Asiatick researches : or, transactions of the society instituted in Bengal for enquiring into the history and antiquities, the arts, sciences, and literature, of Asia. Vol. 4 has distinctive title: Dissertations and miscellaneous pieces, relating to the history and antiquities, the arts, sciences, and literature. of Asia. By the late Sir William Jones, and others. Volume the fourth: being the whole of the articles contained in the fourth volume of the Asiatic researches, printed at Calcutta. 12v. ([London ; Calcutta] : Calcutta Printed. London Reprinted, for Vernor and Hood, No. 31, Poultry 1798-1818). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1317322~S1
